summary.para: Contains the length, in bits, of the public key and the names of the signing and hashing algorithms used for strong signing.

remarks.para: This structure is returned by the function when the dwFlags parameter is set to CRYPT_VERIFY_CERT_SIGN_RETURN_STRONG_PROPERTIES_FLAG.

summary.para: The buffer contains a Unicode string that denotes the signing algorithm / hashing algorithm pair used, for example "RSA/SHA256".
The buffer contains the length, in bits, of the asymmetric key used for signing.
